response.body: {"id":"msg_test456","type":"message","role":"assistant","model":"claude-3-haiku-20240307","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Here's a fascinating fact about artificial intelligence: The term \"artificial intelligence\" was coined in 1956 by computer scientist John McCarthy at the Dartmouth Conference, which is considered the founding event of AI as an academic field. Interestingly, McCarthy initially thought that creating human-level AI would take about a decade - we're still working on it nearly 70 years later!"}],"stop_reason":"end_turn","stop_sequence":null,"usage":{"input_tokens":18,"output_tokens":68}}
